```{r setup-table-2, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, comment = NA,
                      options(digits = 3, scipen = 999))
library(tidyverse)
library(plm)
library(stargazer)
```

```{r data-2, include=FALSE}
df <- # data
  here::here("data", "covid_data_final.csv") %>% 
  read_csv(show_col_types = "FALSE") %>% 
  filter(date >= "2020-03-01")

sc_names <-
  df %>%
  names() 

soc_cap_measures <- sc_names[c(14:17, 46:53)]
```

```{r table-2, results='asis'}
df %>%
  select(
    cases_new,
    stringency_index_lag,
    state_level_index,
    percent_adults_with_ba,
    percent_in_fair_or_poor_health,
    percent_black,
    percent_rural,
    percent_65,
    average_temperature,
    median_household_income,
    density
  ) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  stargazer(
    type = "latex",
    summary.stat = c("n",
                     "min",
                     "max",
                     "mean",
                     "median",
                     "sd"),
    digits = 2,
    covariate.labels = c(
      "New Cases",
      "$\\mathrm{Stringency_{t-7}}$",
      "State Level Index",
      "\\% Bachelor's",
      "\\% Fair/Poor Health",
      "\\% Black",
      "\\% Rural",
      "\\% > 65",
      "Average Temperature",
      "Median Income",
      "Population Density"
    ),
    title = "Descriptive Statistics",
    header = FALSE,
    no.space = TRUE
  )
```
